name: Reel Fishing: Master’s Challenge
description:
Natsume's best-selling Reel Fishing series comes ashore in the biggest Reel Fishing game yet, Reel Fishing: Master's Challenge! For a reason you can't quite explain, you've been drawn back to the fishing lodge you used to visit as a kid with your dad. Once the novice watching your father fish, can you now take on the challenges put forth by your father, and become the Fishing Master yourself? Featuring over 50 kinds of tackle, 20 kinds of rods, and 60 kinds of fish, it's the most fun you can have fishing without putting on your waders!
Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.
1 player(s)
2097KB Minimum
Touchscreen
